description.value:
You embellish your spellcasting with entrancing flourishes and grand pronouncements, making it harder to identify or counter.

If the next action you use is to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Cast a Spell], creatures with the ability to Cast that Spell don't automatically know what the spell is.

In addition, creatures that witness your spellcasting take a -2 circumstance penalty to checks to identify the spell with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Recall Knowledge] and checks to counteract the spell during its casting (such as with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Counterspell (Prepared)]{Counterspell}).
